message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe we can reach a more agreeable price. How about $160?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $170, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $155.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiation. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $160.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit. How about we meet at $162?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $158.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! I'm willing to make one last push. I can do $165, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiation. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $160.
